snippet.title: I'm Making a Pizza Tower Reskin (showcase/teaser)
snippet.description:
I've taken up the task of making a complete reskin of Pizza Tower but with characters from the hit indie cartoon Helluva Boss! starring Moxxie as Peppino.
This is my first time officially talking about this project on this channel so I've prepared some answers to questions you might have.

Q: "How far are you in this project?"
A: It's been almost exactly 2 months since I started and I've gotten almost all of Peppino's base sprites (no transformations) replaced.

Q: "How much are you going to change?"
A: The end goal at the moment is replace all sprites for Peppino, Gustavo and the bosses, thought there are smaller additions I'd like to add if I feel like it later in development.

Q: "Why Helluva Boss?"
A: This whole idea spawned from comparisons I made between Moxxie and Peppino, both being anxious messes that are good with guns, I slowly made more connections between other characters that just felt too perfect to pass up.

Q: "Who's going to replace X character/boss?"
A: The current list of featured HB characters I'm fine with sharing at the moment are:
Moxxie (Peppino)
Millie (Gustavo)
Loona (Brick)
Striker (The Vigilante)
Blitzo (The Noise)
and Stolas (Noisette)

Q: "Was that new music I heard?"
A: Indeed, Moxxie will have a unique escape theme composed by @Thefungang123 , they are currently the only other person I've also had work directly on this mod with me.

Q: "When will this be finished?"
A: The actual most unknowable answer right now, there's literal thousands of sprites overall I've yet to do so don't hold your breath, it's gonna be a while, but if I had to give a rough estimate I'd say early 2024 at the absolute earliest.

Hopefully that clears most things up, so yeah, PT mod community! help! 
https://twitter.com/TheWinterer06
https://twitter.com/TheWinterer06
(I will also be giving more consistent updates on this project on my other socials so just a reminder to follow me if you aren't already)
